product_name: Mario BadescuTravel Size Facial Spray With Aloe, Herbs and Rosewater
summary: SummaryMario Badescu's Travel Size Facial Spray With Aloe, Herbs and Rosewater is a cult-favorite face mist that helps revive dehydrated skin with a dewy glow even when you're on the go. Whether spritzed for a hydrating boost or midday pick-me-up, this is a must-have!
details: DetailsBenefitsCult-favorite, multi-purpose mistClassic Rose fragranceRevives dehydrated skin with a healthy, dewy glowHelps boost skin's clarity with clarifying Thyme ExtractReveals radiant, re-energized skinItem 2278150How To UseMist onto face, neck, or hair as needed. Use it to infuse more hydration before or after applying moisturizer, as a pick-me-up on the go, or post-makeup application to give skin a dewy finish. If product gets into eyes, rinse well with water.IngredientsAqua (Water, Eau), Propylene Glycol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Rosa Canina Extract, Thymus Vulgaris (Thyme) Leaf Extract, Fucus Vesiculosus (Bladderwrack) Extract, Gardenia Florida Fruit Extract, Caprylyl Glycol, Hexylene Glycol, Polysorbate 20, Parfum (Fragrance), Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Chloride, Citronellol, Geraniol, CI 17200 (Red 33), CI 42090 (Blue 1).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Mist onto face, neck, or hair as needed. Use it to infuse more hydration before or after applying moisturizer, as a pick-me-up on the go, or post-makeup application to give skin a dewy finish. If product gets into eyes, rinse well with water.

reviews.headline: don't care if it doesn't actually do anything, it feels GR8
reviews.comments: This is a guilty pleasure buy for me. I'm a scientist and usually can't get behind products that have no "proven" use, but WOW I love how this stuff feels on a hot day after I come inside, or after/during a day at the beach. Smells great too.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again!
reviews.comments: This smells so good and it truly hydrates my face! I wear it daily.

reviews.headline: PRINCESS SPRAY OKAY
reviews.comments: I don't know if I'm imagining things, but whenever I spray this rose water on my face before bed, I wake up feeling like a beautiful princess. I have dull skin and I really think this brings out the glow from within and some cute rosiness from my cheeks. I could be trippin but all I know is that I always buy a new bottle once I start running out. It's my pretty princess facial spray

reviews.headline: I would buy this product forever
reviews.comments: Love the scent and how hydrated my face feels after applying this!

reviews.headline: It's great for not sensitive skin!
reviews.comments: It made my face break out and it smells bad. But i liked it before my break out.

reviews.comments: I personally love Mario Badescu's travel size spray. First it's very convenient, love the smell, and fits in any bag to use on the go. I will always get the travel size for myself and others.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again, it's so amazing

reviews.headline: It's not terrible
reviews.comments: I got this facial spray in my stalking for christmas in a bigger size. at first I loved it but as time went on I found that it make u look greasy, and is heavy on the skin. I do like it for a little refresh but only a little spritz. does not smell bad in my opinion. And very great price.

reviews.comments: I absolutely love this facial spray. Use it every night, and is so refreshing and helps my skin stay so healthy and clean!

reviews.headline: I would never buy this again

media.headline: I would by this product again.
I definitely can't see myself without this product.
media.caption: Comfortable in my own skin

media.headline: I see why it has a cult following

faceoff_positive.comments: I used to work at a Lush cosmetics store and basically switched over all my previous hair and skin care(philosophy/it's a 10/pureology) once I tried many of their products and lived them to bits. After seeing such a difference in my skin and hair with more natural/fresh ingredients I was sold on keeping my hair n skin care as natural as I can. Fast forward to now: I don't work there anymore and don't have the amazing 50% employee discount. So I ran out of my toner from lush and figured now is a good time to try something new and different but reasonably priced and more natural as well. Saw this for $5 and have fallen in love. I didn't think I'd find a toner better than the one I used for the same or cheaper price and I have. The rose scent is strong but I LOVE rose so it's a relaxing scent to me. The rose is softening/reduces redness and great for sensitive skin as it calms. The aloe is hydrating and softening and slumps the skin. Rosemary in this is great for oil control even for those who are dry. I've been using it morning before my moisturizer and primer for makeup and at night after I cleanse and follow up with derma e overnight peel or serum then moisturizer. When I'm out I'm stocking up and buying the larger size.
faceoff_positive.headline: Absolutely heavenly on my face

faceoff_negative.comments: I got a sample of their facial spray. They do not put all the ingredients on the small bottle. They only say active ingredients which of course are all great. I ordered several bottles for myself, coworker and sister online. When I get the larger bottles I realize the active ingredients (all the good/natural sounding stuff) are very low on the ingredient list which means the product does not has have much of thosd ingredients in it. It's water and the second (which means it's a main ingredient) is propylene glycol. This is the main ingredient in antifreeze. It's really bad for you. But cheaper companies use it in several beauty products. If it's lower on the ingredient list it may be ok to use but in this case it's not. I ended up googling the brand and saw several lawsuits against them for bad ingredients in their products :( There are several other great facial sprays that have natural ingredients. Stick to those.
faceoff_negative.headline: INGREDIENTS ARE HORRIBLE
